element.name: MessageId
element.comment: Unique Message Id as defined in Spec

element.name: StirrActivity
element.comment: Stirring activity number of actual requested step

element.name: ModeElec
element.comment: Mode, 1 = Computer mode available, 0 = Computer mode not available

element.name: ModeStirr
element.comment: Mode, 1 = Computer mode available, 0 = Computer mode not available

element.name: ModeMat
element.comment: Mode, 1 = Computer mode available, 0 = Computer mode not available

element.name: Type
element.comment: Type, 2 = Steel Sample, 3 = Slag Sample, 4 = Temperature, 5 = CELOX, 6 = Slag CELOX

element.name: Enabled
element.comment: 1 = Yes, 0 = No, Item 1,2 = Initial Heating, Item 3,4 = Main Heating, Item 5,6 = Final Heating, Item 7 = Temp Hold

element.name: ActivityType
element.comment: Activity type number, defined as follows: 3 = InitialHeating, 4 = MainHeating, 5 = FinalHeating, 15 = TempHold

element.name: StepNo
element.comment: Step number, defined as follows: 1 = fixed step, 2 = variable step

element.name: PhaseNo
element.comment: Phase number, defined as follows: 1 = SlagBreaking, 2 = Deoxidation, 3 = InitialHeating, 4 = MainHeating, 5 = FinalHeating, 6 = CoolingStirring, 7 = SlagForming, 8 = FirstAlloying, 9 = SecondAlloying, 10 = CoolingMaterial, 11 = Trimming, 12 = SoftStirring, 13 = Ca-Treatment, 14 = CleanStirring, 15 = TempHold, 16 = Sampling, 17 = Desulphurization, 18 = Intermediate

element.name: StepPriority
element.comment: Priority of steps (99 is high, 1 is low)

element.name: PhaseNo
element.comment: Phase number, defined as follows: 1 = SlagBreaking, 2 = Deoxidation, 3 = InitialHeating, 4 = MainHeating, 5 = FinalHeating, 6 = CoolingStirring, 7 = SlagForming, 8 = FirstAlloying, 9 = SecondAlloying, 10 = CoolingMaterial, 11 = Trimming, 12 = SoftStirring, 13 = Ca-Treatment, 14 = CleanStirring, 15 = TempHold, 16 = Sampling, 17 = Desulphurization, 18 = Intermediate

element.name: StepPriority
element.comment: Priority of steps (99 is high, 1 is low)

element.name: ParamValue
element.comment: Parameter Value according to Parameter Name

element.name: MatWeight
element.comment: Material weight according to material code

element.name: MatSequence
element.comment: Material sequence according to material code

element.name: Source
element.comment: Material source 1 = Bin, 2 = Hand, 3 = Scrap Yard

element.name: MatWeight
element.comment: Material weight according to material code

element.name: MatSequence
element.comment: Material sequence according to material code

element.name: MessageId
element.comment: unique message id as defined in telegram specification

element.name: PROD_ORDER
element.comment: Unique Product order id for Melt shop

element.name: TREATSTART
element.comment: Heat start time based on L2-Heat Announcement

element.name: TREATEND
element.comment: Heat end time based on L1-Heat End

element.name: MessageId
element.comment: unique message id as defined in telegram specification

element.name: PROD_ORDER
element.comment: Unique Product order id for Melt shop

element.name: MessageId
element.comment: unique message id as defined in telegram specification

element.name: PLANT_UNIT
element.comment: Specification of plant unit: e.g. B1, A1, C1,…

element.name: DELAY_CODE
element.dbcol: Event BOF_EvMsg:: evBOFDelayStatus or LTS_EvMsg:: evLTSDelayStatus

element.name: DELAY_START_TIME
element.comment: Manual entered start time of delay

element.name: DELAY_END_TIME
element.comment: End time of delay: - first manual entered - updated actual delay end time based on process events.
